subject: Help with order from aliexpress
description_text:
Hello aorry for disturbing you but i want to resolve this issue i have, i
order plus x pedals and 1 set of 2 haptic reactors, but it shipped on
diferent shippments, i already have the pedals and had to pay 107€ of taxes
to receive it, (sent by ups), mesnwhile the haptics where sent in CTT
courier, but the problem was that aliexpress gaveme the receipt with bot
orders on it with a total of 387€, so the CTT courier was basing the taxes
on 23% of  387€, i already paid the taxes for tge pedals why would i have
to pay it again right? So CTT is sending back the haptics, the question is
if you can help me with this by sending again the haptics for me or just
sending another ones for me, on aliexpress the solution is there for me to
get a refund but i prefer to receive the haptics, can you help me?
I send proof on ctt courier

conversations.body_text: Hi Osvaldo Sousa,  Please provide your AliExpress order number and a screenshot of the order so that we can look into it for you.

Thank you very much!
The number for tracking is: LR258593104NL (haptics)
Order number: 3058058399427328

just wanted the haptics, Thank you for your support
